Ninkal tavrattaiyum, injilaiyum, unkal iraivanitamiruntu unkalukku irakkappatta (marra)varraiyum (unmaiyakave) ninkal kataippitikkatavarai ninkal etilum cerntavarkalalla'' enru nir kuruviraka. Umatu iraivanitamiruntu umakku irakkappattavai avarkalil perumpalanavarkalukku poramaiyaiyum, nirakarippaiyume niccayamaka atikappatutti varum. Akave, innirakarippavarkalaip parri nir kavalai kollatir
